name: Advanced Alteration Bench
description: The Advanced Alteration Bench is a late game technology that allows prospectors to create Attachment Packs ( Tier 3 ) and Advanced Attachment Packs ( Tier 4 ) to upgrade armor pieces, ranged weapons, and tools. An active power connection providing at least 1,500 electricity to craft Attachment Packs is required. A power connection is not required to add and remove Attachment packs from items.
